QAs.question: What is the location of the ACL2023 conference?
QAs.answer: The location of the conference is in Toronto, Canada.

QAs.question: Will there be any virtual components to the ACL2023 conference?
QAs.answer: The ACL2023 Conference is an in-person conference with virtual components including Attendance to all Meeting sessions via the virtual conference platform, Access to online poster gallery, Access to online networking opportunities, Attendance to all recorded sessions on demand for at least one month following the Meeting.
QAs.from: ACL2023/Registration/content/introduction/The Full Conference Virtual Registration Fee Includes

QAs.question: What is the deadline for early registration
QAs.answer: The early registration deadline is  June 18, 2023, 11:59 PM (EDT)

QAs.question: What is the deadline for submission in Main Conference?
QAs.answer: The Direct paper submission deadline is January 20, 2023, 11:59PM UTC-12:00 (“anywhere on Earth”).

QAs.question: What is the notification date in research track?
QAs.answer: The notification date is May 1, 2023, 11:59PM UTC-12:00 (“anywhere on Earth”)

QAs.question: Will there be social programs at the conference?
QAs.answer: Yes, there will be a social program at the conference.

QAs.question: when is the social program of this conference?
QAs.answer: The social program of this conference is from 7:00 PM to 10:30 PM July 11th .

QAs.question: Can the conference provide visa letter for attendees?
QAs.answer: You can apply for an invitation letter for obtaining a VISA for ACL 2023 in this form if you have submitted a paper to the main conference ACL 2023 as an author (including co-authors) and your Softconf ID is associated with the submission.

QAs.question: What is ACL student research workshop?
QAs.answer: The ACL 2023 Student Research Workshop (SRW) is a forum to bring together students investigating various areas of Computational Linguistics, Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. The workshop provides an excellent opportunity for participants to present their work and to receive mentorship and valuable feedback from the international research community.

QAs.question: When is the Paper submission deadline for the student research workshop paper?
QAs.answer: Deadline for student research workshop paper is May 5, 2023, 11:59PM UTC-12:00 (“anywhere on Earth”).
QAs.from: ACL2023/Calls/CALL FOR PAPERS/Student Research Workshop/content/Important Dates

QAs.question: When is the student research workshop notification?
QAs.answer: Notification for student research workshop is June 8, 2023.
QAs.from: ACL2023/Calls/CALL FOR PAPERS/Student Research Workshop/content/Important Dates

QAs.question: What is the cancelation policy of regisration?
QAs.answer:
Cancellation of registration one month or more prior to the conference (June 09, 2023, or before), will be refunded the full amount paid. (Minus up to $50 processing fee)

Cancellations up to three weeks prior to the conference (June 16, 2023) will be refunded the ACL membership (if paid as part of the registration) and any amounts paid over and above the first $200.

Cancellations 2 weeks prior to start of Conference (June 23, 2023), and all no-shows, will not be refunded any amount. They will be able to retain the current full year ACL membership (if paid as part of the registration) and have access virtually.

Exceptions: Cancellation due to governmental travel restrictions, failure to obtain a visa, or serious illness that prevents travel to the conference will be refunded the full amount paid (Minus up to $50 processing fee) regardless of when the notification is received by the ACL Office and must submit documentation supporting the above cancelation exceptions.

QAs.question: What is the time period of author response in main conference?
QAs.answer: Time period of author response is from March 17 to March24, 2023

QAs.question: Who are the tutorial chairs?
QAs.answer: The tutorial chairs are Yun-Nung (Vivian) Chen、Margot Mieskes and Siva Reddy.

QAs.question: Who are the workshop chairs?
QAs.answer: The workshop chairs are Eduardo Blanco、Yang Feng and Annie Louis.

QAs.question: How can I contact program chairs?
QAs.answer: You can contact them at acl2023-pc@googlegroups.com.

QAs.question: How can I contact industry track chairs?
QAs.answer: You can contact them at acl-2023-industry-track-pcs@googlegroups.com.

QAs.question: What is the main focus of the Industry Track of ACL 2023?
QAs.answer: The Industry Track focuses on papers that advance the understanding of, and demonstrate the effective handling of, practical issues related to the deployment of language processing technologies in non-trivial real-world systems.

QAs.question: Can students also submit papers to industry track?
QAs.answer: Yes! If your work matches the industry track call for papers, consider submitting a paper to the industry track.
QAs.from: ACL2023/Calls/CALL FOR PAPERS/Industry Track/content/Frequently Asked Questions

QAs.question: Where will accepted papers in Industry track for ACL2023 be published?
QAs.answer: Accepted industry track papers will be published as a separate volume of the proceedings. For example, see the EMNLP 2022 proceedings.
QAs.from: ACL2023/Calls/CALL FOR PAPERS/Industry Track/content/Frequently Asked Questions

QAs.question: When is the deadline for tutorials proposals submission?
QAs.answer: The deadline for tutorials proposals submission is December 1st, 2022

QAs.question: When is the deadline for the system demonstration paper submission?
QAs.answer: The deadline for the system demonstration paper submission was February 24, 2023.

QAs.question: When is the system demonstration notification of acceptance?
QAs.answer: The notification date is May 8, 2023

QAs.question: When was the deadline for proposals for workshops?
QAs.answer: The deadline for proposal submission deadline was November 15, 2022.

QAs.question: When is the workshops notification of acceptance?
QAs.answer: The notification date is December 14, 2022.

QAs.question: When was the tutorials proposals notification of acceptance?
QAs.answer: The tutorials proposals notification was February 3rd, 2023.

QAs.question: What is the new award policy implemented by ACL2023?
QAs.answer: ACL2023 implemented a new award policy which aims for broader recognition of exceptional research, in particular by significantly increasing the pool of outstanding papers to 1.5-2.5% of the total submissions.

QAs.question: What is the fee waiving policy for the tutorial presenters at the EACL 2023, ACL 2023, and EMNLP 2023 conferences?
QAs.answer: Up to 3 instructors per tutorial can have their registration fees waived for the main conference and any subset of co-located tutorials and workshops.

QAs.question: What are the responsibilities of the organizers of the accepted proposals?
QAs.answer: The organizers of the accepted proposals will be responsible for publicizing and running the workshop, including reviewing submissions, producing the camera-ready workshop proceedings, organizing the meeting days, and playing their part to ensure that all participants are aware of ACL’s anti-harassment policy.
